ing.item: Bottle seltzer water or club soda

directions.step:
In a soda glass, stir together the Bailey's, milk, and syrup until well blended. Add the seltzer water all at once, which will produce 2-inch foamy head. Serve immediately. Makes 1 serving. MasterCook formatted by Ethel Snyder
NOTES : This recipe is a modern version of the 1930's New York soda fountain classic. Recipe by: HOME MAGAZINE -- JULY/AUGUST 1997 Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #641 by essie49@juno.com (Ethel R Snyder) on Jun 08, 1997
